jathika shishyabhata balakaya warshikawa pawathwanu labana warshika pradhana agayim kandawura okthobar masa 19 wana dina rantambae di pawathwe.harman losda soyisa kusalana pirinamima, janadhipathi balaka ha balika padakkam pirinamima mehidi sidukere.rajya aarakshaka ha nagarika sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage upades ha adhikshanaya yatathe dina 10k pura mema tharuna huwamaru wadasatahana pawathwimata niyamithayi.me sandaha shri lankawa wisin indiyawa, bangaladeshaya, maladiwayina wani ratawal kihipayaka shishyabhata balaka ha balikawanta da arayum kara athi bawa wadiduratath danagannata thibe.
